items.title: 'Feel like such a hero': The Australians who shattered blood donation records
items.summary: Australians have broken national blood donation records as some centres are booked up until the end of January.

items.title: Donald Trump sues the BBC, seeking billions in damages
items.summary: The BBC apologised to the US president last month, but said it strongly disagreed that there were grounds for a defamation claim.

items.title: Donald Trump condemned for 'disrespectful' attack on Rob Reiner after director's death
items.summary: Trump mocked Rob Reiner in a social media post after the director-actor and his wife Michele were found dead.

items.title: 'We will not give in to fear': Vigils held across Australia to honour victims of Bondi terror attack
items.summary: "We gather not in fear, but in strength," Rabbi Gabi Kaltmann told the crowd at Melbourne's Pillar of Light festival.

items.title: Albanese sets 'immediate' gun control priorities following Bondi Beach terror attack
items.summary: A crackdown on 3D-printed weapons and firearm limits has been flagged, and citizenship requirements for ownership could also be examined.

items.title: 'I can't believe she's gone': Bondi terror attack victims mourned
items.summary: Family and friends are paying tribute to those killed during the Bondi Beach terror attack.

items.title: 'Light a candle': How you can help after the Bondi Beach attack
items.summary: Australians are coming together after Sunday's Bondi Beach attack. This is what you can do to help.

items.title: 'Not a blame game': Antisemitism envoy responds to Bondi attack, following Netanyahu snipe
items.summary: Jillian Segal says part of her plan to combat antisemitism "can and should be accelerated".

items.title: Hong Kong court convicts pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai in national security trial
items.summary: The Australian government said it was "deeply concerned by the guilty verdict handed down to Jimmy Lai in Hong Kong".

items.title: National Cabinet pledges tougher gun laws after Bondi Beach terror attack — as it happened
items.summary: National Cabinet also "pledged to eradicate antisemitism, hate, violence and terrorism".

items.title: What we know so far about the alleged Bondi Beach gunmen
items.summary: While a motive is still unclear, police have revealed fresh details about the pair who mounted the terror attack at Bondi Beach.

items.title: Tributes paid following death of director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele
items.summary: Barack Obama said the actor and director's "achievements in film and television gave us some of our most cherished stories on screen".

items.title: Pakistani man falsely identified as alleged Bondi Beach gunman says he is 'scared'
items.summary: A Sydney man of Pakistani origin says he's been targeted with abuse by people falsely accusing him of being one of the alleged gunmen in the Bondi Beach shooting.

items.title: Mary gave birth to her son in Australia. But he has no valid legal status
items.summary: There's a growing number of undocumented children in regional Australia, born to disengaged migrant workers who have no visa.

items.title: Wanted in Hong Kong, now this China critic's wife is being targeted in Australia
items.summary: Ted Hui, who lives in Australia in exile from Hong Kong, described the incident targeting his wife as "immoral".

items.title: Alleged gunman out of coma; NSW premier defends police response to Bondi terror attack — as it happened
items.summary: NSW Premier Chris Minns also vowed to make the state's gun laws the "toughest" in the country.

items.title: 'Now it's almost embarrassing': Americans on living in Australia under Trump 2.0
items.summary: As interest in US politics surges and Australians' views shift for the worse, Americans reflect on what it's like to be an expat down under.

items.title: Why Sara and Issam still can't go to Cronulla beach 20 years after the riots
items.summary: Australia's racial discrimination commissioner is warning that the factors that fomented the Cronulla riots are still in play today - and that a similar racial brawl could occur again.

items.title: 'Act of evil antisemitism': Terrorist incident declared after 12 killed in Bondi Beach shooting — as it happened
items.summary: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said the "evil that was unleashed at Bondi Beach" was "beyond comprehension".

items.title: Paleo diets sell the idea of 'eating like our ancestors'. Here's what they actually ate
items.summary: A new study by Australian and Canadian archaeologists proves what our ancestors really ate: everything.

items.title: 'He took all my wages': How visa rules can expose migrant women to family violence
items.summary: A Thai woman's harrowing story shows how migrant women are vulnerable to particular forms of family violence.

items.title: Attorney-General Michelle Rowland to repay 2023 family trip as expenses scandal grows
items.summary: The treasurer on Sunday rejected calls for Rowland to resign amid growing scrutiny on politician's spending.

items.title: Supermarket giants face $10 million fines over price gouging
items.summary: Shoppers have been promised a fairer price at the checkout under laws to crack down on purported price-gouging by major supermarkets.

items.title: Two US soldiers and an interpreter killed in Syria ambush attack
items.summary: Donald Trump has vowed to inflict "very serious retaliation" after an Islamic State ambush in Syria that killed three Americans.
